lines.text: Hey I recognise him!
That is weird...
It's one of my friends.
How? What is he doing here?
No Clue...
I don't want to alarm you but it's probably not the Emile from your universe.
EMILE!!!
Oh... Hey there Emilia
What the hell are you doing here?
That is a long story... but the short story is that I was drinking, and stumbled into a portal on one of my walks... and now I am trying to find my apartment.
Goddamnit Emile. This is just... wait, your apartment? How on earth do you have an apartment here?
Again, a long story. But just roll with it... Sober Emile will probably be able to answer all your questions
Fair enough I guess... So seeing as we are here, can you help me with something?
Sure. How may I be of assistance to you?
Long story short, Jay was taken and I am trying to get him back.
No! Not my boi Jay! We must rescue him from peril!
Awesome! Thankyou!
First who is that chick?
That is Saphire, and she...
Enough! That is all I will remember. Second, we need to find my apartment so I can get my stuff before we go.
*sigh* Fine. Let's go. Do you have any idea which one it is?
Uhh.... nope. I just know it is in that building.
Goddamnit Emile... alright, let's go.
Bitchin'
